frontmatter.title: Managing Third Party Risks for Keepspeech project
frontmatter.summary:
Today we resolved an integration error caused by a recent change on Zoomâ€™s
side which temporarily disrupted the core product feature.

`,(0,r.jsx)(i.p,{children:`Since we rely on third party platforms like Zoom, we often have no visibility into
